Battera::

She smiled. "Yeah.  I need more than what i have now in order to be 
more effective in battle."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Dachande::
> 
>     "He can decide where I go and what I do, how much of that he 
controls depends on what mode I am in at the time," He said. "Like 
when I got you out of the fight, he decided to move me, I took you 
though.
>     "But if you want some upgrades I can monitor your systems and 
make sure he doesn't tamper with them."
